PIZFactorOracle Struct Reference

#include <pizFactorOracle.h>


Data Fields

long size
long peak
long index
long shuttle
long backwardThreshold
double straightRatio
PIZFactorOracleNode * nodes

Detailed Description

Remarks:
Implemented with dynamic array of nodes ; For each node, arcs are stored in dynamic arrays too. Node's dynamic arrays are created on the first query and keep in memory until pizFactorOracleFree() is called.

Field Documentation

long PIZFactorOracle::size

Current number of nodes allocated.

long PIZFactorOracle::peak

Maximum number of nodes reached.

long PIZFactorOracle::index

Current number of nodes.

long PIZFactorOracle::shuttle

Index of the playback head.

long PIZFactorOracle::backwardThreshold

Threshold for backward playback.

double PIZFactorOracle::straightRatio

Threshold for straight playback.

PIZFactorOracleNode* PIZFactorOracle::nodes

Array of nodes.
